required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: V501 Immunogenicity Study in Females Age 9 to 17 Years (V501-028)
clinical_study.official_title: V501 Phase II Immunogenicity Study in Females Aged 9 to 17 Years

brief_summary.textblock: The study evaluates the immunogenicity, safety and tolerability of V501 in preadolescent females

primary_outcome.measure: Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) 6 Serum Antibody Titer at One Month After Completed Vaccination Series
primary_outcome.time_frame: At one month after completed vaccination series (Month 7)
primary_outcome.description: Month 7 HPV Competitive Luminex immunoassay (cLIA) Geometric Mean Titers (GMT) by vaccine group. The limit of detection of the assay was 7 mMU/ml. GMTs and confidence limits below the limit of detection are shown as "7.0".

primary_outcome.measure: Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) 11 Serum Antibody Titer at One Month After Completed Vaccination Series
primary_outcome.time_frame: At one month after completed vaccination series (Month 7)
primary_outcome.description: Month 7 HPV Competitive Luminex immunoassay (cLIA) Geometric Mean Titers by vaccine group. The limit of detection of the assay was 8 mMU/ml. GMTs and confidence limits below the limit of detection are shown as "8.0".

primary_outcome.measure: Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) 16 Serum Antibody Titer at One Month After Completed Vaccination Series
primary_outcome.time_frame: At one month after completed vaccination series (Month 7)
primary_outcome.description: Month 7 HPV Competitive Luminex immunoassay (cLIA) Geometric Mean Titers by vaccine group. The limit of detection of the assay was 11 mMU/ml. GMTs and confidence limits below the limit of detection are shown as "11.0".

primary_outcome.measure: Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) 18 Serum Antibody Titer at One Month After Completed Vaccination Series
primary_outcome.time_frame: At one month after completed vaccination series (Month 7)
primary_outcome.description: Month 7 HPV Competitive Luminex immunoassay (cLIA) Geometric Mean Titers by vaccine group. The limit of detection of the assay was 10 mMU/ml. GMTs and confidence limits below the limit of detection are shown as "10.0".

secondary_outcome.measure: HPV 6, 11, 16 and 18 Serum Antibody Titer at 24 Month After Completed Vaccination Series
secondary_outcome.description: Month 30 HPV cLIA Geometric Mean Titers by vaccine group.

arm_group.description: V501 vaccination Quadrivalent HPV (Types 6, 11, 16, 18) L1 VLP Vaccine Injection cervix cancer exgenlesion Vaccination at Day 1, Month 2, and Month 6. Total 3 vaccinations. 0.5 mL intramuscular dose of V501 (HPV L1 Virus-Like Particle [VLP] Type 6, Type 11, Type 16, Type 18) or placebo at Day 1, Month 2 and Month 6.
Placebo vaccination, Placebo 0.5 ml injection in 3 dosing regimen

intervention.description: V501; Gardasil, 0.5 ml injection in 3 dosing regimen
Placebo 0.5 ml injection in 3 dosing regimen

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Virginal Female Subject Aged 9 To 17 Years
Exclusion Criteria:
- Male Subject

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Study was conducted at 8 sites in Japan from 2006 to 2009.

group.title: V501
group.description: V501 vaccination: Gardasil, 0.5 ml injection in 3 dosing regimen. Quadrivalent Human Papillomavirus (Types 6, 11, 16, 18) Recombinant Vaccine (V501)

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Placebo vaccination 0.5 ml injection in 3 dosing regimen.

participants_list.participants: Completed at 24 month after vaccination series (Month 30). Subjects were followed until Month 30
Completed at 1 month after vaccination series (Month 7). Subjects were followed until Month 7

group.title: V501
group.description: V501 vaccination: Gardasil, 0.5 ml injection in 3 dosing regimen. Quadrivalent Human Papillomavirus (Types 6, 11, 16, 18) Recombinant Vaccine (V501)

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Placebo vaccination 0.5 ml injection in 3 dosing regimen.

outcome.title: Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) 6 Serum Antibody Titer at One Month After Completed Vaccination Series
outcome.description: Month 7 HPV Competitive Luminex immunoassay (cLIA) Geometric Mean Titers (GMT) by vaccine group. The limit of detection of the assay was 7 mMU/ml. GMTs and confidence limits below the limit of detection are shown as "7.0".
outcome.time_frame: At one month after completed vaccination series (Month 7)
outcome.population: The per protocol immunogenicity population includes all subjects who were not general protocol violators, received all 3 vaccinations within acceptable day ranges, were seronegative at Day 1 for the relevant HPV type, and a Month 7 serum sample collected within an acceptable time range.

reported_events.time_frame: Serious Adverse Event (SAE) data were collected from the entire period of the study. Other non serious AE data were collected from Day 1 to Day 15 following vaccination.
reported_events.desc: All adverse events described in case report forms were tabulated by converting them to the preferred term (PT) and classifying them by primary system organ class (PSOC) using the International Conference on Harmonisation (ICH) medical dictionary for regulatory activities (MedDRA) Ver. 9.0.

group.title: V501

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Merck agreements may vary with individual investigators, but will not prohibit any investigator from publishing. Merck supports the publication of results from all centers of a multi-center trial but requests that reports based on single-site data not precede the primary publication of the entire clinical trial.

point_of_contact.name_or_title: Senior Vice President, Global Clinical Development
